questions.question: Which is the largest ocean on Earth?
questions.explanation: The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean on Earth.

questions.question: Which is the smallest ocean in the world?
questions.explanation: The Arctic Ocean is the smallest ocean.

questions.question: Which river is the longest in the world?
questions.explanation: The Nile is the longest river in the world.

questions.question: Which is the deepest oceanic trench?
questions.explanation: The Mariana Trench is the deepest.

questions.question: Which sea is the saltiest in the world?
questions.explanation: The Dead Sea is the saltiest.

questions.question: Which is the largest freshwater lake by area?
questions.explanation: Lake Superior is the largest by area.

questions.question: Which is the largest lake by volume?
questions.explanation: Lake Baikal is the largest by volume.

questions.question: Which ocean is located between Africa, Asia, Australia, and the Southern Ocean?
questions.explanation: The Indian Ocean is located between these continents.

questions.question: Which river flows through the most countries?
questions.explanation: The Danube flows through 10 countries.

questions.question: Which is the largest gulf in the world?
questions.explanation: The Gulf of Mexico is the largest.

questions.question: Which is the longest river in Asia?
questions.explanation: The Yangtze is the longest river in Asia.

questions.question: Which is the largest bay in the world?
questions.explanation: The Bay of Bengal is the largest.

questions.question: Which is the world's largest coral reef system?
questions.explanation: The Great Barrier Reef is the largest.

questions.question: Which is the largest inland sea?
questions.explanation: The Caspian Sea is the largest inland sea.

questions.question: Which river has the largest discharge of water?
questions.explanation: The Amazon has the largest discharge.

questions.question: Which is the longest river in India?
questions.explanation: The Ganga is the longest river in India.

questions.question: Which is the largest waterfall by volume?
questions.explanation: Inga Falls has the largest volume.

questions.question: Which is the largest delta in the world?
questions.explanation: The Sundarbans is the largest delta.

questions.question: Which is the largest island in the world surrounded by water?
questions.explanation: Greenland is the largest island.

questions.question: Which ocean is the coldest?
questions.explanation: The Arctic Ocean is the coldest.

questions.question: Which is the largest river in Africa?
questions.explanation: The Nile is the largest river in Africa.

questions.question: Which is the largest sea in the world?
questions.explanation: The Philippine Sea is the largest.

questions.question: Which is the deepest lake in the world?
questions.explanation: Lake Baikal is the deepest.

questions.question: Which is the largest man-made lake in the world?
questions.explanation: Lake Volta is the largest man-made lake.

questions.question: Which is the largest peninsula surrounded by water?
questions.explanation: The Arabian Peninsula is the largest.

questions.question: Which is the largest strait in the world?
questions.explanation: The Strait of Malacca is the largest.

questions.question: Which is the largest archipelago in the world?
questions.explanation: The Malay Archipelago is the largest.

questions.question: Which is the largest lagoon in the world?
questions.explanation: New Caledonia Lagoon is the largest.

questions.question: Which is the largest estuary in the world?
questions.explanation: St. Lawrence Estuary is the largest.

questions.question: Which is the largest fjord in the world?
questions.explanation: Scoresby Sund in Greenland is the largest fjord.
